bge.math

Class Quaternion

  • java.lang.Object
    • bge.math.Quaternion

  • public class Quaternion
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for representing a Quaternion. Quaternions are commonly used for handling rotations. Created by Yannic Siebenhaar on 20.07.2015.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      float w
      The (real) w component of a Quaternion.
      float x
      The (imaginary) x component of a Quaternion.
      float y
      The (imaginary) y component of a Quaternion.
      float z
      The (imaginary) z component of a Quaternion.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Quaternion()
      Constructs a new Quaternion, all Values are set to 0.0f.
      Quaternion(float x, float y, float z, float w)
      Constructs a new Quaternion with given values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Quaternion fromAngleAxis(float angle, Vector3 axis)
      Converts a rotation around angle axis into a Quaternion.
      Quaternion fromEulerAngles(Vector3 euler)
      Converts a rotation from euler angles into a Quaternion.
      float length()
      Calculates the length of the Quaternion and returns the result as floating point number.
      Quaternion mul(Quaternion rhs)
      Performs a multiplication with another Quaternion.
      Quaternion mul(Vector3 rhs)
      Performs a multiplication with a Vector3.
      Quaternion normalize()
      Normalizes the Quaternion.
      void set(float x, float y, float z, float w)
      Setter method to set all values of the Quaternion.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Converts Quaternion into a String.

    • Method Detail

      • set

        public void set(float x,
                float y,
                float z,
                float w)
        Setter method to set all values of the Quaternion. If you want to set a single value, use the public property.
        Parameters:
        x - The (imaginary) x component of a Quaternion.
        y - The (imaginary) y component of a Quaternion.
        z - The (imaginary) z component of a Quaternion.
        w - The (real) w component of a Quaternion.

      • mul

        public Quaternion mul(Quaternion rhs)
        Performs a multiplication with another Quaternion. This operation returns a new Quaternion which contains the calculated data.
        Parameters:
        rhs - A Quaternion as right hand side argument.
        Returns:
        A new Quaternion that holds the result.

      • mul

        public Quaternion mul(Vector3 rhs)
        Performs a multiplication with a Vector3. This operation returns a new Quaternion which contains the calculated data.
        Parameters:
        rhs - A Vector3 as right hand side argument.
        Returns:
        A new Quaternion that holds the result.

      • length

        public float length()
        Calculates the length of the Quaternion and returns the result as floating point number.
        Returns:
        The length of the Quaternion.

      • normalize

        public Quaternion normalize()
        Normalizes the Quaternion. Normalizing means dividing all components (x, y, z, w) by the length of a Quaternion. This Operation affects the Quaternion and changes data.
        Returns:
        The updated instance.

      • fromAngleAxis

        public Quaternion fromAngleAxis(float angle,
                                Vector3 axis)
        Converts a rotation around angle axis into a Quaternion. This Operation affects the Quaternion and changes data.
        Parameters:
        angle - The rotation in degrees around the axis.
        axis - The axis as Vector3 to rotate around.
        Returns:
        The updated instance.

      • fromEulerAngles

        public Quaternion fromEulerAngles(Vector3 euler)
        Converts a rotation from euler angles into a Quaternion. This Operation affects the Quaternion and changes data.
        Parameters:
        euler - A Vector3 which represents an euler rotation
        Returns:
        The updated instance.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Converts Quaternion into a String. Useful for debugging.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The converted String.
